Function reference

Datasets

aqol_scrg_dict_r3
Data dictionary for AQoL scoring
predictors_lup
Predictors lookup table
replication_popl_tb
Synthetic population replication dataset
repln_ds_dict_r3
Data dictionary for study population dataset

S3 Classes

youthvars_aqol6d_adol() make_pt_youthvars_aqol6d_adol() is_youthvars_aqol6d_adol()
youthvars S3 class for Assessment of Quality of Life Six Dimension Health Utility - Adolescent Version (AQoL6d Adolescent))
youthvars_phq9() make_pt_youthvars_phq9() is_youthvars_phq9()
youthvars S3 class for Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-9) scores
youthvars_bads() make_pt_youthvars_bads() is_youthvars_bads()
youthvars S3 class for Behavioural Activation for Depression Scale (BADS) scores
youthvars_gad7() make_pt_youthvars_gad7() is_youthvars_gad7()
youthvars S3 class for Generalised Anxiety Disorder Scale (GAD-7) scores
youthvars_oasis() make_pt_youthvars_oasis() is_youthvars_oasis()
youthvars S3 class for Overall Anxiety Severity and Impairment Scale (OASIS) scores
youthvars_scared() make_pt_youthvars_scared() is_youthvars_scared()
youthvars S3 class for Screen for Child Anxiety Related Disorders (SCARED) scores
youthvars_k6() make_pt_youthvars_k6() is_youthvars_k6()
youthvars S3 class for Kessler Psychological Distress Scale (K6) - US Scoring System scores
youthvars_sofas() make_pt_youthvars_sofas() is_youthvars_sofas()
youthvars S3 class for Social and Occupational Functioning Assessment Scale (SOFAS)

Functions

add_interval_var()
Add interval variable

Add participation variable

Assert dataset is valid

Make starred correlations table output object of multiple potential types

Make descriptive statistics table
make_final_repln_ds_dict()
Make final replication dataset dictionary
make_formula()
Make formula
make_itm_resp_plts()
Make item response plots
make_sub_tot_plts()
Make sub total plots
make_tfd_repln_ds_dict_r3()
Make transformed replication dataset dictionary ready4 S3
make_var_by_round_plt()
Make variable by round plot
print_descv_stats_tbl()
Print descriptive statistics table
transform_ds_for_tstng()
Transform dataset for testing
transform_raw_ds_for_analysis()
Transform raw dataset for analysis
write_descv_tbls()
Write descriptive tables

Methods

characterize(<YouthvarsDescriptives>)
Characterize the features of a ready4 framework module (or sub-module)
depict(<YouthvarsSeries>)
Depict (plot) features of a ready4 framework module (or sub-module)
exhibit(<YouthvarsSeries>)
Exhibit (print to console) features of a ready4 framework module (or sub-module)
ratify(<YouthvarsSeries>)
Ratify (validate) a ready4 framework module (or sub-module)
renew(<YouthvarsDescriptives>) renew(<YouthvarsProfile>)
Renew (update) a ready4 framework module (or sub-module)
renewSlot(<YouthvarsSeries>)
Apply the renew method to a Ready4Module slot
